text: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend is a 2010 romantic comedy movie. It is about a novelist and problems around him. The movie stars Alyssa Milano, Beau Bridges and Carol Kane. It was released in May 2010 in the United States. The movie received very positive reviews from the critics. Category:2010 romantic comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies
title: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend (2010 movie)
